response.original_title: Taking Care of Business Vol. 2: Logging
response.overview: Charlie Conway continues his railroad ride-along ventures, this time conniving the logging industry. Join the fun as Charlie visits the Hull-Oakes Lumber Co. and learns the ins and outs of modern logging and lumber operation. He then spends a day working with the engine crew of the Mt. Rainer Railroad, showing you just what it takes to run and maintain a working steam locomotive. Big industry, spectacular scenery, and live steam are all part of this trip!
response.title: Taking Care of Business Vol. 2: Logging
